title: How can I have a USB stick with multi os install?

forumNotes.author: deltaboypt
forumNotes.content:
Hello,  

Well I see in this forum many ways to boot multi os install from CD/DVD, I try to follow some tutorials and I can make a USB stick run Aero Studio and using chainloader from grub4dos with the setupldr.bin files but I have lots of errors ![:dubbio:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/dubbio.gif)  
Can anyone say how can I do it well?  

Many thanks

forumNotes.author: maanu
forumNotes.content: did you even try to search on this forums ? i have seen at least 3 threads yesterday alone , having same question .

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
\*\*\* Install XP from USB AFTER Booting with PE from HDD or USB \*\*\*  

Install from USB without Booting from USB by using U_XP_SET  

[http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=21883](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=21883 "External link")

forumNotes.author: deltaboypt
forumNotes.content:
Hi  

In first place many thanks people.  

Wimb it is possible to create a USB-stick with multi xp installs but with the Aero Studio interface?  
How can I do it?  

Thanks a lot (sorry my english) ![:dubbio:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/dubbio.gif)
